sentence1: But there was a poor woman who was in urgent need of a little meal one evening, and she asked whether they would not allow her to grind a little flour during the night.
sentence2: "For heaven's sake," said the mill-owner, "that is quite impossible!

sentence2: When she came, she lit a fire under a big tar-barrel that was standing there;

sentence2: "Self is my name," said the woman.
